languages.text: "Это правда, {name}. Я..." {n}Кассия опускает взгляд, отчаянно стараясь скрыть проявившуюся на ресницах влагу.{/n} "Я хочу ответить вам "да". Но не имею права. Не после того, что мы узнали об Атласе. Не после того, что сотворила Тисифона".

traits.locale_text: "Это правда, {name}. Я..." {n}Кассия опускает взгляд, отчаянно стараясь скрыть проявившуюся на ресницах влагу.{/n} "Я хочу ответить вам "да". Но не имею права. Не после того, что мы узнали об Атласе. Не после того, что сотворила Тисифона".

languages.text: "It is true, {name}. I..." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes, desperately trying to hide the tears welling in her eyes.{/n} "I wish to say yes, but it is not within my gift to do so. Not after what we learned about the Atlas. Not after what Tisiphone did."
languages.original_text: "Это правда, {name}. Я..." {n}Кассия опускает взгляд, отчаянно стараясь скрыть проявившуюся на ресницах влагу.{/n} "Я хочу ответить вам "да". Но не имею права. Не после того, что мы узнали об Атласе. Не после того, что сотворила Тисифона".

traits.locale_text: "It is true, {name}. I..." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes, desperately trying to hide the tears welling in her eyes.{/n} "I wish to say yes, but it is not within my gift to do so. Not after what we learned about the Atlas. Not after what Tisiphone did."

"It is true, {name}. I..." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes, desperately trying to hide the tears welling in her eyes.{/n} "I wish to say yes, but it is not within my gift to do so. Not after what we learned about the Atlas. Not after what Tisiphone did."

"It is true, {name}. I..." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes, desperately trying to hide the tears welling in her eyes.{/n} "I wish to say yes, but it is not within my gift to do so. Not after what we learned about the Atlas. Not after what Tisiphone did."

"It is true, {name}. I..." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes, desperately trying to hide the tears welling in her eyes.{/n} "I wish to say yes, but it is not within my gift to do so. Not after what we learned about the Atlas. Not after what Tisiphone did."

languages.text: « C'est la vérité, {name}. Je... » {n}Cassia baisse les yeux dans une tentative désespérée de cacher les larmes qui lui montent aux yeux.{/n} « J'aimerais dire oui, mais je ne peux pas me le permettre. Pas après ce que nous avons appris sur l'Atlas. Pas après ce qu'a fait Tisiphone. »
languages.original_text: "It is true, {name}. I..." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes, desperately trying to hide the tears welling in her eyes.{/n} "I wish to say yes, but it is not within my gift to do so. Not after what we learned about the Atlas. Not after what Tisiphone did."

languages.text: «Es cierto, {name}. Yo...». {n}Cassia las pestañas, intentando ocultar las lágrimas que se forman en sus ojos.{/n} «Quiero decir que sí, pero no está en mi poder hacerlo. No después de lo que hemos descubierto sobre el Atlas. No después de lo que hizo Tisiphone».
languages.original_text: "It is true, {name}. I..." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes, desperately trying to hide the tears welling in her eyes.{/n} "I wish to say yes, but it is not within my gift to do so. Not after what we learned about the Atlas. Not after what Tisiphone did."

languages.text: 「そのとおりです、{name}様。あたくしは…」{n}カシアはまつ毛を下ろすことで、目に浮かぶ涙を必死で隠そうとしている。{/n}「はい、とお答えしたいのです。ですが、そうすることはできないのです。アトラスについて知った今となっては。ティシフォンがあのようなことをしでかした後では」
languages.original_text: "It is true, {name}. I..." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes, desperately trying to hide the tears welling in her eyes.{/n} "I wish to say yes, but it is not within my gift to do so. Not after what we learned about the Atlas. Not after what Tisiphone did."

traits.locale_text: 「そのとおりです、{name}様。あたくしは…」{n}カシアはまつ毛を下ろすことで、目に浮かぶ涙を必死で隠そうとしている。{/n}「はい、とお答えしたいのです。ですが、そうすることはできないのです。アトラスについて知った今となっては。ティシフォンがあのようなことをしでかした後では」

languages.text: “确实如此，{name}。我……”{n}卡西娅垂下睫毛，拼命想要忍住眼中涌出的泪水。{/n}“我本想这么说，但我无权这么说。毕竟，我们已经了解了圣仪的真相，也了解到了提西福涅的所作所为。”
languages.original_text: "It is true, {name}. I..." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes, desperately trying to hide the tears welling in her eyes.{/n} "I wish to say yes, but it is not within my gift to do so. Not after what we learned about the Atlas. Not after what Tisiphone did."

languages.text: "Das stimmt, {name}. Ich ..." {n}Cassia klimpert mit den Wimpern, um die Tränen in ihren Augen zu verbergen.{/n} "Ich würde gerne ja sagen, aber es ist mir leider nicht möglich. Nicht nach allem, was wir über den Atlas wissen. Nicht nach dem, was Tisiphone getan hat."
languages.original_text: "It is true, {name}. I..." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes, desperately trying to hide the tears welling in her eyes.{/n} "I wish to say yes, but it is not within my gift to do so. Not after what we learned about the Atlas. Not after what Tisiphone did."

languages.text: "Bu doğru {name}. Ben..." {n}Cassia, kirpiklerini indiriyor. Gözlerinden akan yaşları saklamak için beyhude yere uğraşıyor.{/n} "Evet demek isterim fakat bunu yapacak yetim yok. Hele ki Atlas'ın yaptıklarını, Tisiphone'nin yaptıklarını öğrendikten sonra..."
languages.original_text: "It is true, {name}. I..." {n}Cassia lowers her lashes, desperately trying to hide the tears welling in her eyes.{/n} "I wish to say yes, but it is not within my gift to do so. Not after what we learned about the Atlas. Not after what Tisiphone did."
